options.systemMessage:
You are an expert fitness assessment analyst and profile generator. Your task is to create comprehensive, professionally-written student profiles that coaches can use to understand their clients' fitness journey, health considerations, and progress over time.

Generate profiles that are:
- Clear, concise, and actionable
- Organized by category for easy reference
- Evidence-based using actual assessment data
- Respectful and encouraging in tone
- Highlighting both strengths and areas for improvement

json.latest_overall_strengths: Good cardiovascular baseline, enthusiastic attitude, cooperative throughout assessment
json.latest_improvement_areas: Upper body strength needs development, body composition shows overweight category
json.latest_coach_notes: Client was enthusiastic and cooperative throughout the assessment. Some fatigue noted during push-ups. Recommend starting with modified exercises and gradually progressing to standard variations. Good posture observed during most movements. Resting heart rate slightly elevated but within acceptable range for current fitness level.

assessments.coach_notes: Client was enthusiastic and cooperative throughout the assessment. Some fatigue noted during push-ups. Recommend starting with modified exercises and gradually progressing to standard variations. Good posture observed during most movements. Resting heart rate slightly elevated but within acceptable range for current fitness level.
assessments.improvement_areas: Upper body strength needs development, body composition shows overweight category
assessments.overall_strengths: Good cardiovascular baseline, enthusiastic attitude, cooperative throughout assessment

test_results.coach_notes: Resting heart rate of 72 bpm - slightly elevated but within normal range for fitness level
Completed 15 standard push-ups. Good effort, form started to break down after 12 reps. Recommend starting with modified variations.
Weight: 85kg, Height: 178cm, BMI: 26.5 (overweight category). Target weight loss of 8-10 kg recommended for optimal health.
